long_description: With sweet style and comfort, the Electra Haname 3i Women's Bike offers easy-going cruising thanks to a 3-speed hub, coaster brakes and stylish graphics. Flat Foot Technology(R) offers a relaxed, efficient pedaling position that also allows you to easily and comfortably put both feet down on the ground when you've stopped. Aluminum frame is resilient and is adorned with festive graphics; sloping top tube makes mounting and dismounting quick and easy. Shimano Nexus 3-speed internally geared rear hub with coaster brake offers silky-smooth shifting and low-maintenance stopping power. Easy-shifting twist shifter and comfortable ergonomic hand grips add cruising convenience and comfort. Have fun while staying clean and looking good with the painted-to-match chain cover and front and rear fenders; saddle and grips complement the graphics. Platform pedals are compatible with most types of footwear. Let other cyclists and pedestrians know you're there with the handlebar-mounted bell. One size fits most. Specs on the Electra Haname 3i women's cruiser bike are subject to change.
short_description: With sweet style and comfort, the Electra Haname 3i Women's Bike offers easy-going cruising thanks to a 3-speed hub, coaster brakes and stylish graphics.
